---
title: "Enter In"
author: "C.O."
date: "September 2025"
draft: true
---

Entering into GOD’s presence is a special place to be. When we enter into this place, we find peace, joy and rest. In HIS presence, understanding and wisdom are given. As we continue on life’s journey, may we enter into HIS presence daily.

Meditate on these verses to gain wisdom:

-   Week 1
    -   Psalms 100:4
-   Week 2
    -   Hebrews 4: 10-11
-   Week 3
    -   Isaiah 2:10-11
-   Week 4
    -   Luke 13:24-25
